# CPC Initiative {#care-cpc}

The __Comprehensive Primary Care (CPC) Initiative - Participating Primary Care Practices__ dataset provides a list of practices involved in a multi-payer initiative which fosters collaboration between public and private health care payers to strengthen primary care.

## Metadata

```{r}
#| label: s7_object
#| echo: false
end <- care_endpoint("cpc_primary")
print_meta(end)
```

### Resources

```{r}
#| label: resources
#| echo: false
print_resources(end)
```

### Dictionary

```{r}
#| label: data_dict
#| echo: false
new_tbl(
  field = c(
    "Name of Initiative", 
    "Participating Practice", 
    "Participating Practice Location", 
    "State", 
    "City", 
    "Geographic Reach", 
    "Street Address", 
    "Zip Code"
  ),
  description = c(
    "Plain text field containing the name of the initiative. Populates the initiative name onto the Where Innovation is Happening maps.", 
    "Plain text field containing the names of medical practices which participated in the CPC initiative.", 
    "Location field containing the street number, name, and the longitude and latitude coordinates of the participating practice.", 
    "Plain text field containing the two-letter state abbreviation for the state where the participating practice is located.", 
    "Plain text field containing the name of the city where the participating practice is located.", 
    "Plain text field intended to contain information about the geographic reach of the participating practice. This field is not currently in use.", 
    "Plain text field containing the street number and name of the street where the participating practice is located.",
    "Number field intended to contain the zip code for the location of the participating practice. This field is not currently in use."
  )
)
```
